itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest ESPN Sports Science host John Brenkus and discuss the immediate future of sports, how players like Trevor Lawrence could make money playing Esports during the Coronavirus shutdown, how a professional Wiffle Ball league could really take off, chat about how sports could induce a societal shift back to normalcy, and end the show with the legitimacy of conspiracy theories.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest ESPN Sports Science host John Brenkus and discuss the immediate future of sports, how players like Trevor Lawrence could make money playing Esports during the Coronavirus shutdown, how a professional Wiffle Ball league could really take off, chat about how sports could induce a societal shift back to normalcy, and end the show with the legitimacy of conspiracy theories.
